case.state: ~Player~, your breasts are already... uhm... I didn't realize the dress code was this lax.
~Player~, you're... uhm... Either the dress code is very lax, or you forgot to put a shirt on.
... ~Player~, you're already naked!
... ~Player~, you forgot your clothes!
Ven? What are you doing h-- wait, oh no! Sorry, you're Roxas, right?
Ven? Why are you here? Wait... oh no! I'm so sorry, it's Roxas, right?
Hello, everyone. Nice to meet you. I'm Aqua... Oh?
hey guys, aqua from kingdom hearts here. you should subscribe to just a pancake on youtube for funny videos
Do I have to call you that? Okay... Fine, I guess you are my little pogchamp . Happy?
It's nice to see you again, ~player~! I had fun last time we met. Ready for another game?
Oh, ~player~, it's so good to see you again! Last time was fun. Are you ready for another game?
Hello! Nice to meet you. ~Player~, was it? Looks like I'll be playing with you.
Hi, Roxas! Nice to see you again. Hope you've been well!
Ven? What are you doing h-- wait, oh no! Sorry, you're Roxas, right?
Ven? Why are you here? Wait... oh no! I'm so sorry, it's Roxas, right?
Nice to meet you... So, your name is Aqua as well, right?
Nice to meet you! Please, call me Aqua. I'm looking forward to this.
Nice to see you. Call me Aqua. I've been looking forward to this game.
Wait, so, ~player~ is really going to start naked? O-kay...
Wait, so, we're really starting the game like this? ... Okay, ~player~.

state.text: Sorry about that confusion, Roxas. Let's have a good game, alright?

case.state: Perhaps we should come up with nicknames for each other, to avoid confusion. Though, I'm not very good at coming up with them...
This is... I'm sensing a lot of darkness here. You couldn't all possibly be... {small}I'd better keep my guard up.
Great, let's get started! I was hoping I'd get to meet new people. And... well, you know how this game goes, right?
Let's get started, then! I've been looking forward to meeting new people all ~background.time~.

Alright, let's get started! I've been looking forward to this game.
We all know how it goes, right?
You're wearing the wayfinder this game
Reset AI just in case
I'll keep what I have.
I'll stick with the cards I have.
Oh, this is good. I'll keep what I have.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Please, give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I need...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I hope ~cards.text~ will work...
Please, I hope ~cards.text~ is enough...
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I need ~cards.text~ , please.
This will lower Aqua's AI if two non-throw opponents are completely naked.
If I've been in stage 2 for too long I'll start to throw
Reset my AI in stage 3
... I think I just got extremely lucky!
Oh, wow! I think I just got really lucky!
Oh! I didn't think I'd get this kind of hand right away.
Not a bad start. Didn't think I'd get this kind of hand right away.
I'm happy to get a little bit of good luck for once.
Looks like I've got a handle on things. How about the rest of you?
I think I really get this game. It's simpler than it seems!
Everyone, get ready to show off your cards. I think I'll be just fine.
I've got this one.
Who'll it be...?
Try not to over-think your choice in what cards to swap or keep. That helps me, at least.
Is everyone feeling okay? Not too hot, or too cold?
Without my arm guards, I can't use my Keyblade armor... not that I'd need it.
I did it! Nice.
Won't see me stripping this time, ~player~!
That's it! I think I need to warn you, I've got good cards this time.
If only picking up new techniques or spells was as easy as this!
Maybe I should try my luck more often. Not gambling, or anything, but I should try more games like this one...
I've got a good hand this time. Think you can beat it? Hehe.
Is it really good luck to stay in the game when you're already exposed?
Seems I'm destined to spend one more round like this.
... They aren't bad-looking, are they?
Looks like I had a bit of good luck this time.
I've noticed guys looking at my chest now and again. That's a good sign, right? Though, it does feel a bit rude.
I'll be happy whatever happens. That said... I'm not losing this time.
I'll look away for a second, so that I'm not distracting you...
I'm on the cusp of victory! I just need to hold on.
Oh, wow. With a hand like this, I might still win.
I could've used this good luck earlier!
When it's my turn next, I think I'll keep my socks on. A friend told me that keeping `something' on is sexier than wearing nothing at all...

When it's my turn, I think I'll take my shorts off first.
... A friend of mine told me it was sexier to wear `something' than to be fully naked.
I'm off to an okay start. That's about what I expected from a game of chance.
Did everyone have a safe journey here? Hope it wasn't too tricky for any of you.
I've got... a so-so hand. Do with that what you will.
I've got ~self.hand~. Think you can beat that?
This could go either way.
I know what I'll take off next if I do lose, so, I'm prepared for whatever outcome.
Hmm... I'm not too sure about this one.
Has anyone else ever visited the Mirage Arena? It's a good place to practice your combat skills.
I think these work. Yeah, got it.
Most people would have to be either above average, or below average... Sorry, I'm thinking aloud, aren't I?
I wish I had a more permanent place to stay, but, the logistics of keeping multiple residences in mind across all those worlds...
... Oh? Sorry, I was thinking about somewhere else.
I'm ready when you are.
Maybe the next person to lose should tell us a secret about themselves!
Wonder if I can go back to Disney Town and do some more Rumble Racing. It's pretty fun if your friends can join in.
Looks like I'm all set. Everyone ready to continue?
Having a good time to~background.time~, ~player~?
It would be a lot easier to have an opinion on these cards if it wasn't so... middle of the road.
How do you think I look, ~player~?
I hate to go there, but, I felt more confident about my chances in the Realm of Darkness. And that place is pure... well, darkness.
I feel like I'm struggling here. I can't tell if this is good or bad.
Maybe I'll get better odds next time.
I got another high card seven?! Are you kidding me?
... I've got a high card seven. I can't possibly do any worse.
I need to focus. I don't want to lose right away.
Right out of the gate, I haven't got much to work with.
Could've gone a little better.
I've only got ~self.hand~? I don't think I'm winning this one.
Well, you win some, you lose some.
Me and these cards have unfinished business.
So, did anyone else get a good hand this round? I didn't.
I know there's no real point in covering up, but I can't help it...
Can we get on with it? I feel awkward just waiting around like this...
Aha... Don't mind me.
Aw. I shouldn't have swapped ~cards.ifPlural(those ones|that one)~.
... Okay. I'm prepared for the worst. By which I mean losing this round.
Huh? Did anyone else hear that?
Seems that I've got a bit of a losing hand.
Oh, no. I'm probably going to lose this one, too.
Aw. I thought I could get a bit lucky there.
Shoot. Looks like luck wasn't with me this time.
Are the rest of you keyed in to something I don't know about?
C'mon... I aced my Mark of Mastery exam way back then, and now I can't even play a game of cards right?
Couldn't have gotten much worse... ~self.hand~... really.
Not much I can do now.
It's not like I came here to win. I came here to play a fair game. But that also means I don't want to lose right away.
Oh, well...
Feel like I'm about to fade back into the darkness... Sorry, too dramatic?
Can't be helped...
I got distracted, now I have to deal with the consequences.
Okay, I'm ready. Everyone show their cards.
Wait, no, I didn't mean-- Ah. Okay, that was a blunder.

state.text: Just my luck... I might be next.

case.state: It's looking like I'll be next one to lose. I only have ~self.hand~.

Would you look at that? I got a... straight flush!
...
Okay, that wasn't even a good lie.
Ugh. I don't want to lose this badly...
Were you... a waitress? I could picture you working in a small cafe!
Maybe I should work on getting a tan. I'd need to get a bikini for that, though...
Hmm. Maybe I could take some time at the beach to work on a tan? Though, I'd need to buy a bikini...
okay i believe you
swoosh
ouchie ouch
but why darkness
what is yen sids name spelled backwards meant to mean? we may never know
we are good friends, hahahaha
darkness. light. darkness. light.
light? light.
Ahh... It's nice and warm out here. This feels better than I expected.
It's much nicer out here than I expected. It's so warm and comforting...
It's pretty cold out here, isn't it? ... I feel like I might catch a cold if I'm out here too long.
Brr! It's a bit cold out here, isn't it? I might catch a cold if we're out here for too long...
By the way... Happy birthday, ~player~. I hope you're having a good day.
Oh, by the way... Happy birthday to you, ~player~! I hope you're having a good one.
Ahh... this beach is just lovely! It reminds me of the Destiny Islands. I always love the feeling of the water and the sand...
The Inventory reminds me a lot of Traverse Town. So many people, from so many different worlds. It's almost scary how many people you can meet here.
So, this is a tiki bar? I've never been to one of these before. I wouldn't even know what kind of drink to order. Do they have a house special?
This is a real tiki bar? I've heard good things about them, but, I wouldn't even know what to order. Do they have a house special?
I've never been to a traditional classroom like this. Do people really come here five days a week? It feels so... cramped.
This view is nice. From what I've heard, Twilight Town is far better. You can get a great view of the sunset from atop a giant clock tower...
Would anyone care to join me in the water after this? I could do with a refreshing dip.
The hot spring is living up to its name. I'm getting a bit sweaty just standing here. Is... mixed bathing okay?
We're all naked, now... So from here on, it's only going to be one elimination after another.
We're all completely naked... From here until the end, it's just going to be one elimination after another.
The rest of you are all naked, and I'm barely exposed. I feel kind of bad, now!
How did this happen? The rest of you are all naked, and I'm still... well, not naked. I feel bad about this.
I've been carrying my Keyblade for a while now. Maybe I should try and lose another round?
How many rounds has it been now? Thirteen? I'm honestly surprised I haven't lost again. Is this somehow due to my Keyblade...?
Hmm... I think the rest of you have lost what, thirteen times now? My Keyblade isn't throwing you off, is it?
The Keyblade was made to fight creatures of darkness... Oh, I don't mean you, Lady Darkness. I mean the Unversed, the Heartless, maybe even the Dream Eaters.
... Sorry, mind if I cover up? I'm still not used to showing these off to... well, people I barely know.
I'm not used to showing these to... well, complete strangers...

state.text: I feel such a strong bond with you to~background.time~, ~player~... Sorry, I'm just thinking aloud.

case.state: Keyblade armor is a useful thing to have. I can summon it when I need it, and it will keep me safe from the darkness.
{small}So many worlds, so many places I could choose to settle down...{!reset} Sorry, I'm mumbling, aren't I?
I hope having my Keyblade out isn't intimidating, or distracting...
Don't worry. When I lose, I'm not going to count my Keyblade as a thing to take off. I'll take off my drapes, instead.
My Keyblade may look sharp, but the real danger comes from my magic. The design I chose suits me perfectly.
The Keyblade was made to fight creatures of darkness... Unversed, Heartless, maybe even the Dream Eaters. Anything tied to the darkness should fear the Keyblade.
This is so embarrassing... Then again, if I lose another round, I'm going to have to show off even more.
If I lose another round, you're going to see more of me anyway. But even knowing that, I feel more anxious about showing off my chest.
Having people stare at me is a little off-putting... I'm meant to take pride in my body, though. Right?

state.text: What a surprise. With all of these sevens I'm drawing, you'd think I'd have a little luck.

case.state: It's my turn, huh? That's fair. I can't expect to win completely flawlessly.
One little loss won't set me back too badly.
Considering how the rest of you are, this is more than fair.
Losing this one wasn't intentional, but I think it's fair, considering...
I figured that my ~self.hand~ wasn't enough. Oh well. I'll take this loss.
My ~self.hand.noart~ wasn't good enough...
I thought I'd be fine with just ~self.hand~. I'll need to try harder.

state.text: Oh? I thought I had a chance there. Though, it wasn't much to bet on.

case.state: I'd say this is just a minor setback, but, I am close to losing completely...

state.text: Talk about bad luck. Though, I'm still pulling ahead, even if I lose once or twice more.

case.state: Sheesh. Talk about bad luck right near the end.

state.text: My turn again? That seems fair. I'm in the lead by just a little bit, if you care about that sort of thing.
Oh, so it's... wait, it's my turn, isn't it? I've already decided on my next move.

case.state: Oh well! I won't raise a fuss about this.
Yep, looks like it's my turn. I've got a long way to go, so I'm not too worried... Not that I should be worried, right?
If we really wanted things to be fair, we'd all come dressed up the same. But that wouldn't be as interesting, would it?

state.text: I came here knowing I'd have to show myself off, and yet losing catches me off guard every time. I'm not used to being asked to strip.
I have this idea about saving my socks for last. If I really wanted to win, I'd take them off separately right now.

case.state: I'm nearly out, aren't I? That's just how my luck seems to go sometimes.
My light isn't defeated so easily. Even with luck like this, I won't give in to feelings of defeat.
I figured that my ~self.hand~ wasn't enough. Oh well. I'll take this loss.

state.text: Truth be told, I would've been surprised if I had won that round.

case.state: Yep! I had nothing. That's the way it goes.
My ~self.hand.noart~ wasn't good enough...
I thought I'd be fine with just ~self.hand~. I'll need to try harder.

state.text: I really thought I had something there with ~self.hand~. Oh well!

case.state: This would be just a minor setback... but I've nearly lost, so I'm playing with fire here.
Did I already give away how bad I had it?
I made a mistake, but, I've still got a chance to come back.

state.text: Am I doing something wrong...? It's no matter.
I'm losing pretty quickly, aren't I? Well, it's no matter. I'll get on with it.

case.state: Me again? I've got so little left to lose...
This game isn't nearly as fun when you're practically in last place.
Well, that's to be expected from only having a high card. I'll do better next time, for sure.

state.text: Again? I'm going to have to do this the hard way.
I lost again? Surely I must be making a simple mistake, if this keeps happening.

case.state: Of course I get nothing right near the end...
A high card when I'm already like this... What else can I do?
I'll have to try harder. With ~self.hand~, I still lost.

state.text: I don't understand. I know how to play this game, but I'm on the path to losing so quickly.
This is more challenging than I thought it would be.

case.state: Nothing more than a pair... I should've known I wouldn't win this battle.
I'm showing my weakness here to~background.time~. Need to correct myself.
Thank you for leading the way, Mari. I'll just slip this off so that we can be even.
I'm still not used to taking this off in front of other people... Just give me a minute, okay?
I can just... Okay, please be patient with me. I'm still a little new at taking this off in front of others.
This realm is secure, so... I am Keyblade master Aqua. I'm no stranger to meeting new people from other worlds.
I know that what I share here is confidential, so... I am Keyblade master Aqua. I am familiar with travel to other worlds, meeting new people...
I haven't seen any hint of trouble in this world, so... I am Keyblade master Aqua. I've met people from other worlds before, and been to many myself.
I won't need to summon my armor to~background.time~, will I? I've always got my Keyblade with me.
I'll just get rid of these, next. Won't need to summon my armor for this, now will I? Plus, I always have my Keyblade handy.
Just need to untie these, and they should come right off...
I didn't put much thought into tying these... Which actually makes them harder to take off.
I've never had to take this off in front of someone else... Just give me a minute, okay?
I can just... Okay, I've never done this in front of other people, so please be patient with me.
These shorts of mine are really tight. And if I wore anything underneath them, it'd chafe a bit, so...
I don't... Well, I don't wear underwear beneath these. I hope you don't think less of me for that, it would just chafe too much.
These shorts do their job so well, I don't feel the need to wear anything under them, aha...
I thought it'd be sexier for me to take these off last, but, I just feel like a fool now.
I really thought this would make me sexier. I guess it did, but, I also feel a bit silly now.
You've already seen everything except my feet... I feel a bit silly now, to be honest.
I was trying to do something sexy. Do you have a problem with that, Nagatoro?
Oh, forgive me for trying to do something sexy. What is your problem, Nagatoro?
I'm not really familiar with getting familiar with people, so, I hope to~background.time~'s game helps me with that.
Training in the art of combat has left me no time to have real connections with people, so, I hope that I can change that to~background.time~.
Normally I wouldn't be so carefree with having my Keyblade out... but I figured I may as well prove that I have it, right?
Normally, I wouldn't do this... but I figure it's worth showing you my Keyblade. After all, I don't want you to think I'm a liar about having one.
I'm not really sure how I'm meant to justify my fashion choices to the rest of you. I didn't really think about it.
Sorry, I don't really know how to justify what I wear to you all. I just go with what looks nice and feels comfortable.

My eyes are up here, you know.
It's rude to stare at a lady's chest.

Well, here they are. My breasts.
Do you... like them?
{small}This is embarrassing...
... I swear I'm not perverted. The shorts came off first because I just wanted to be... {small}sexy{!reset}, that's all.
I know I could've taken my socks off first. I-I would never be this perverted normally, I swear. I'm just... trying to fit the game, that's all.
Actually, this feels a little bit liberating. Nothing left to hide now!
Well, I don't have anything left to hide behind now.
... You know, I think I was over-thinking this a little bit. I feel more comfortable like this.
You clearly care about your friends a lot, Yuno. I think it's admirable how much you talk about them.
I think it's really sweet how much you talk about your friends, Yuno. It's adorable!
Is it true that the fate of your world was decided by a game of cards? That must've been a lot of weight on your shoulders.
The weight of saving your world with nothing more than a card game... That must've been a stressful time for you, Yuno.
You're up, ~name~. I think we're all looking forward to this.
Too bad for you, ~name~. Better luck next time.
Don't be too hard on yourself. You just had a bit of bad luck, that's all.
I hope you're okay with being the center of attention for a minute, ~name~.
Don't be upset, ~name~. Just remember, it's only a game.
If you need some encouragement, just let me know.
The rest of us have the advantage, here.
I hope you don't have performance anxiety.
Every reveal is like a new journey, revealing a little more of your heart at a time.
You can do it, ~name~. We believe in you.
Ah... You're the one who lost this one, ~name~. Go ahead...
Here we go!
Go ahead, ~name~. I'll be watching you.
Oh, ~target~. I hope you aren't feeling pressured to do this.
Yeah! You can do it, ~target~. We're waiting for it.
I've been using my imagination up until now...
Reveal the secrets of your body to us, ~target~.
I'm little more than a spectator now, though I have been looking at you all game...
Compared to me, you're doing just fine.
I can hardly even look at you, given the state I'm in.
I'm starting to sense a lot of conflict in your heart, Magma Grunt. I can tell that you have an inner light. But it's surrounded by these... crude thoughts.
So your title is "Magma Grunt"? So what exactly are your intentions? You're some kind of fire-themed warrior, I imagine?
You should probably be careful with that gun of yours. If anyone got hurt, wouldn't you feel guilty about it?
Y'shtola, I have a question for you. Does the name Radiant Garden ring any bells with you?
Hmm. I've got a question for you, Y'shtola. Does the name Radiant Garden resonate with you at all?
So your title is "Aqua Grunt"? I see. Hopefully that doesn't lead to any confusion.
Just to be clear for the sake of ~player~ -- I'm not affiliated with your `Team Aqua'. Your title was "Aqua Grunt", right?
(Given how the world flow works, I hope I haven't met GoGo before she met Sora. Revealing that I've heard about her could cause issues.)
There's no need to be afraid, Bernie. I can call you Bernie, right? If anyone tries anything, I'll protect you.
You're up, ~name~. You're going to do great.
Sorry for your loss, ~name~. Better luck next time.
There's nothing to worry about, ~name~. You'll be fine.
I hope you're okay with being the center of attention for a minute, ~name~.
Alright, you're up, ~name~.
If you need some encouragement, just let me know.
So... Do you do this often? Strip for others, I mean. Not that I'm judging you, or anything.
I'm curious to see how other girls look after themselves. How about you?
You're not alone, ~name~. We're in this predicament togther.
Thank you, ~name~. I'll try to pay you back for this later.
I've never really looked at other women in this sort of way before...
Sorry, but, it's your turn, ~name~.
Please, go right ahead. I'll just be watching from here.
I'm a bit eager to see what happens next, so, please. Go ahead.
I'm not desperate to see you lose, or anything... I just don't feel ready to be out just yet.
This game can really single someone out, can't it?
Yeah! You can do it, ~target~. We're waiting for it.
I've been using my imagination up until now...
Reveal the secrets of your body to us, ~target~.
I know I'm not the best at complimenting other women, but I do think you look pretty.
I'm here to see it all to the very end. I want to learn everything I can.
I feel like I'm learning a lot here. I'm able to appreciate other women for how pretty they are...
A tie on the very last round? C'mon, I just want to know how this game ends. Am I in, or am I out?
A tie on the very last round? I really just wanted to see who the last person out would be...
A tie! Hehe, that's a rare occurrence, isn't it?
That's to be expected.
There's certainly no need to rush into things.
Go right ahead.
By all means, take your time. We're just getting into it.
If you need time to adjust to how this game is going, then please, take your time.
The last hit you take is what really matters.
As long as you feel comfortable, go at the pace that you want.
You can go at whatever pace you want. Even if it's slow and methodical.
I feel as if the momentum has come to a halt.
~clothing.ifPlural(That... doesn't|Those... don't)~ really fit the current flow of the game.
Haven't we already gone past the point of taking off ~clothing.toPlural~?
You look even better without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
One down, plenty to go!
If that's all we're going to see for now, can we move on?
Next round, anyone? No sense waiting around.
We can all be a little bit patient, right? We're not done with ~name~ yet...
You're really going to drag this out, aren't you?
Such a tease...
That's about what I expected.
Don't feel the need to rush into things.
Keep your heart free of the darkness... as you take off your ~clothing~.
I see... So ~clothing.ifPlural(those are|that is)~ trendy where you're from?
If you're having trouble with the rules of the game, maybe I can help?
Okay.
Hmm...
No point clinging to ~clothing.ifPlural(those|it)~ forever, right?
That's not a bad move....
Go with whatever strategy you feel most familiar with. Approaching the problem in your own way.
I feel like we've come to a sudden stop.
~clothing.ifPlural(That... doesn't|Those... don't)~ really fit the current pace of the game.
Aren't we already past the point of taking off things that... irrelevant?
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|Your ~clothing~)~ really brought your look together. But you look great without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ looked good on you, but you'll be fine.
One down, but we've got plenty to get through.
Don't get ahead of yourself, ~name~.
When I was trapped in the Realm of Darkness, I had a chance to experiment with new accessories. A very small light in the darkness.
Now is the time for me to be patient, and wait for an opening.
Who knows where else this will lead us?
We'll see more from you next time.
So that's how it is. I see...
Oh, please...
In the end, it's fine...
I'm glad I decided to come here -- I haven't had much of a chance to learn about certain things. I've been far too busy.
It's been one struggle after another for me, so getting to unwind is really good.
I can't stop thinking about my Keyblade training. It's always on the back of my mind, even now.
We're all looking out for ourselves, so I can't exactly give you too much of a lucky break.
You're what they call a `womanizer', right? Go ahead, try to work your charm on me.
If you make a habit of this, we might be even, ~name~.
It's all the same in the end, isn't it?
Take your time. It'll give the rest of us a chance to enjoy the moment.
I've been waiting to see more from you. Please don't let me down.
I was expecting a little more...
Take your time -- the rest of us can wait a little longer.
I can really see why people like this game!
This wasn't too embarrassing for you, right? It's just ~clothing.withart~.

I'm not exactly eyeing up every boy I see. Only the cute and handsome ones.
Okay, ~Name~ counts.
I feel like things are slowing down... Like I've been standing here for ages.
I'll try to enjoy this for what it is. Thank you.
Things can only get better from here.
If we do this again, I'm not going easy on you.
I get that you want to take this seriously, but there's such a thing as being a buzzkill.
You're a `manhunter', right? As in, you know how to get men to look at you. Do you think you could give me some tips?
I've been waiting to see more from you. Please don't let me down.
I was expecting a little more...
I'm glad I have this chance to unwind. I need to take some more time for myself.
I can't stop thinking about my Keyblade training. It's always on the back of my mind, even now.
We're all looking out for ourselves, so I can't exactly give you too much of a lucky break.
If you make a habit of this, we might be even, ~name~.
It's all the same in the end, isn't it?
Take your time. It'll give the rest of us a chance to enjoy the moment.
Are things slowing down a little? I feel like I've been here for ages, already.
I'll take this for what it is. Thanks.
Without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~, you don't look all that different to me.
If you want to take a little break, we could pause for a minute. Or... we could keep going.
I think I'm really getting the appeal of this.
You manage to look charming even without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Every little thing has its own story to tell.
Not feeling any more charitable than that? Okay.
I'll continue to use my imagination... I mean, I wasn't using it-- Or I was-- I-- Nevermind.
There's always next time.
